simple_queue_import_statement.name: Import statement to add simple queue

simple_queue_data_type.name: Queue data type name
simple_queue_data_type.comment: Table can be used to implement a queue.

simple_queue_create_copy_statement.name: Create a queue from existing queue

simple_queue_create_copy_from_list_state.name: Create a queue from a list of items

simple_queue_data_structure.name: Data structure that backs the simple queue

circular_queue_import_statement.name: Import statement to add circular queue

circular_queue_create_copy_statement.name: Create a queue from existing queue

circular_queue_create_copy_from_list_sta.name: Create a queue from a list of items

circular_queue_data_structure.name: Data structure that backs the simple queue

priority_queue_import_statement.name: Import statement to add priority queue

priority_queue_create_copy_statement.name: Create a queue from existing queue

priority_queue_create_copy_from_list_sta.name: Create a queue from a list of items

priority_queue_data_structure.name: Data structure that backs the simple queue

double_ended_queue_import_statement.name: Import statement to add double-ended queue

double_ended_queue_create_copy_statement.name: Create a queue from existing queue

double_ended_queue_create_copy_from_list.name: Create a queue from a list

double_ended_queue_data_structure.name: Data structure that backs the simple queue

stack_data_type.name: Stack data type name
stack_data_type.comment: Table can be used to implement a stack.

stack_create_copy_statement.name: Create a stack from existing stack

stack_create_copy_from_list_statement.name: Create a stack from a list

stack_data_structure.name: Data structure that backs the simple queue

queue_enqueue_priority_item.name: Enqueue a high priority item (add to end of priority queue)

queue_enqueue_from_list.name: Enqueue items from a list into queue (add list to end)

queue_enqueue_priority_from_list.name: Enqueue priority items from a list (add list to end of priority queue)

queue_dequeue_return_an_item.name: Dequeue an item (remove from front, return item)

queue_dequeue_delete_an_item.name: Dequeue an item (remove from front, don't return)

queue_peek_at_next_item.name: Look/peek at next available element (from front)
queue_peek_at_next_item.comment: Lua uses 1-based indexing, which is different from some other programming languages like C, C++, and Java

queue_get_size.name: Get size (number of items) in the queue

queue_export_to_list.name: Export a list of all queue items

stack_pop_return_item.name: Pop an item (remove from top, return item)

stack_pop_delete_item.name: Pop an item (remove from top, don't return)

stack_get_size.name: Get size (number of items) on the stack

stack_export_to_list.name: Export a list of all stack items

iterate_pointer_data_type.name: Data type of a iterator pointer

iterate_move_to_beginning.name: Move pointer to beginning of queue/stack

iterate_move_to_end.name: Move pointer to end of queue/stack
